title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Skills: Student-Centered Instructional Design for Remote Foreign Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate foreign language proficiency and foundational instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply three student engagement strategies required in foreign language curriculum design
Learners can design educational content tailored to learner characteristics (gender, age, educational stage) in an LMS-based environment
Learners can develop two or more interactive activities (feedback, learning communities) executable in a smartphone environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
